courses.title: Freshman Engineering Seminar
courses.description: An introduction to the engineering profession featuring presentations about the undergraduate degree programs at Georgia Tech with a focus on career options.

courses.title: Design Thinking and Innovation for Grand Challenges
courses.description: A project-based learning course to develop problem solving skills using design thinking with multidisciplinary teams to tackle Grand Challenges facing humanity.

courses.title: Statics
courses.description: Elements of statics in two and three dimensions, free-body diagrams, distributed loads, centroids, and friction.

courses.title: Startup Lab: Introduction to Technology Ventures
courses.description: Elements of technology venture creation including opportunity identification and validation, ideation, customer discovery, market analysis, minimum viable product development, business models, intellectual property, and capital raises.

courses.title: Mechanics of Deformable Bodies
courses.description: Stress and strain analysis applied to beams, vessels, pipes, and combined loading; stress and strain transformations; beam deflection; column buckling.

courses.title: Intro to Microelectronics and Nanotechnology Revolution
courses.description: Introduction to microelectronics and nanotechnology: the communications revolution, Moore's law, semiconductors, transistors, MEMS, photonics, analylsis of common technological objects, global impact on technology and society.
